summary: Adds a standalone catgirl mage follower called Rinndy to the game.
descriptionHtml:
After spending ten thousand hours (ish) fiddling with RaceMenu I have finally crafted the perfect catgirl. I now share her here for your satisfaction. She casts spells n shit.

I imagine your Bannered Mare is pretty crowded at this point, so Rinndy can be found in the Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar.

Install by copying the files from the archive into your Skyrim data folder.

Added some alternate hair versions. See screenshots.

[u]Credits:

[/u]Dagi-Raht Race - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60404
ApachiiSkyHair - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168
The Eyes of Beauty - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722
Gilded Doublet and Extended Skirt Texture - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44567 and https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80586
Whiskers - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54125
RaceMenu - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624
KS Hairdos Renewal - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311

[u]Recommended Mods:

[/u]Snowfall ENB - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79335 (If you want your screenshots to look like mine)
NPC Visual Transfer Tool - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64875 (Copy Rinndy's appearance onto someone actually useful)
author: triplebackflip
